attributes.title: Worst app iâ€™ve ever come into contact with
attributes.review: Immediately after downloading the app my phone became over whelmed with multiple viruses, then after getting my phone fixed my phone permanently had a really ugly cheetah wallpaper for my lock and homescreen. I cant believe an app like this is even still up on the appstore, truly disgusting.
